metadata.title: CVE-2023-1084 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before15.7.8, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.4, all versionsstarting from 15.9 before 15.9.2. A malicious project Maintainer may createa Project Access Token with Owner level privileges using a crafted request.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
